CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many ridgelines are in this ridgeline chart?
VEC.A: There are {7} slices in this chart.

SRP.Q: What is the spatial relationship of the peak of Convenience-Oriented relative to the peak of Ethical Consumers in terms of vertical (above/below) and horizontal (left/right) directions?
SRP.A: The peak of  Convenience-Oriented is to the {right} of the peak of Ethical Consumers.

VPR.Q: What distribution pattern does the ridgeline representing Budget Shoppers show?
VPR.A: The ridgeline representing Budget Shoppers shows a {Single Peak Distribution}.

VPR.Q: At what value do  Organic Shoppers reach its peaks?

EVJ.Q: Which ridgeline has the highest peak
EVJ.A: The ridgeline representing {Budget Shoppers} has the highest peak.

EVJ.Q: Which label has the highest density at X =90.5?
EVJ.A: At X =90.5,the label with the highest density is {Health-Conscious}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks exceed 28? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Tech-savvy Consumers}'s peak at {84},{Health-Conscious}'s peak at {83},{Convenience-Oriented}'s peak at {29},{Organic Shoppers}'s peak at {81}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks below 52? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Convenience-Oriented}'s peak at {29},{Budget Shoppers}'s peak at {13},{Premium Brands}'s peak at {14},{Ethical Consumers}'s peak at {12}

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Tech-savvy Consumers or Organic Shoppers?
NC.A: {Tech-savvy Consumers} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Premium Brands or Budget Shoppers?
NC.A: {Premium Brands} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Convenience-Oriented or Premium Brands?
NC.A: {Convenience-Oriented} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

MSR.Q: How many ridges have their peak located to the right of the average X value across all ridges?
MSR.A: There are {3} ridges whose peaks are located to the right of the average X value.

MSR.Q: What is the label of the ridge with the largest span along the mountain height?
MSR.A: The ridge with the largest span in the mountain height is {Ethical Consumers}
